public class HalfplaneFlattener<T extends PrimitiveBasisElement>
extends java.lang.Object
implements AbstractStreamFlattener<T>

This flattener maps a filtration value vector, x, to the smallest integer k such that <= k where p is the specified principal direction.

Andrew Tausz
